prompt: Chiikawastyle,Chiikawa,This is a digital drawing in a cute, chibi style featuring Chiikawa, an anthropomorphic white bear with large, expressive eyes and rosy cheeks. The drawing has a soft, whimsical feel with clean lines and gentle shading.
